i agree with dudeofthed, this is not ‘Made entirely by me’, its all kaitnieks with the bitmap changed
and Iv seen 3 or 4 other threads containing a script I made, with the bitmap changed,

i bet this guy doesnt even understand Fast Drawing, or Canvasses

item.title: LOGO MADE BY ME! (highly edited of fastdrawtest)
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

That’s Kaitnieks’s Script from the test folder… You just changed the Bitmap.

Original File: (fastdrawtest.scar)

program FastDrawTest;
type TDirection = (dirLeft, dirRight);

var
  Buffer: Integer;
  bull, bull2: Integer;
  f: Integer;
  Direction: TDirection;
  x: Integer;
begin
  DisplayDebugImgWindow(300, 300);
  bull := BitmapFromString(80, 80, 'z78DAEDDBCB4EC4300C85E157' +
       '2AB019B673E9FB3F1212B3A914129CC67663E73F485E0D85C9D7B' +
       '4B9B4FB4E0821841042082184906CD9EE9FB7AFEF77A53572381E' +
       'EBC7F3FEDCF7774539965D5BB3ACF4E59965DB5E6D597A712CD9D' +
       '20BDF88BE722F7CF1C5175F12DD17657C09BE045F72952FCAF892' +
       'ABD6ACB47C519EB3CFE28B2FBEF8E2BB826F2CE58867E3F818780' +
       '5DFB8CF27E02B699FD7EBF6D8367C33F91E65F1CDE45B938DE5AB' +
       '35FA5DC7779D9E9BD5B794C537B76FDC193ABE597B2EBEE5AC36D' +
       'F957965DF72565BCAAE7CE7D5F5F5575ED957FECE915DF51F41E5' +
       'F36DD7DAF795B78CBC7A2AF7FECFF3AF9D8E3B5AFB4ADCF1958F0' +
       '963555DE5B8BE994CEDDA39BA6F3E597CF1C5175F7CF1C537BA72' +
       '44DFDC2367C94A48B59609EBBB8E6CC76FFD66644D86FE3BB3EFF' +
       '89A1BF75F7C51D6551EF93CBE717D6B3B50E37B2B285FE52BD1CC' +
       'BA8B94DBB766BACE2E61EE5116BBFCF994DF61971F5FDDF699F3F' +
       'DA3DED1A6459DDFB75739CAF3578FEDCCCF31D1FBEFB95E3C9BE9' +
       '39C77F94AF7A7AD6C0B7B72FFB3FA76DAD59F3F5F95B7F5C3D8C9' +
       'FBB9EE18D95DE163E7E5EF78A2DEFE316C71F6913C9D1FCDF283C' +
       'F72DDAE7EA78FB48AEDB3E77072DDF9A7214DF9AB5DD1D794E5FC' +
       '9DC07DFF6AAEF6CBEE7D6337DDE9DD16D13BB33C7DAB77784A9BB' +
       'B669374EB6F0D5BA735D7B7DB633F59C078DB789D6317BE7C2FEB' +
       '3EF3D542C2C7C563F74EDF6D4F1E923D66B236BDAD9B9CF539122' +
       '84104208218490DCF90113EDAE55');
  //create another bulldozer, facing in other direction
  bull2:= CreateMirroredBitmap(bull);

  //Buffer is bitmap that we draw onto before displaying on screen
  //there are few reasons for not drawing on screen directly
  // 1. Flickering - drawing all at once prevents flicker
  // 2. Speed - drawing on bitmap in memory is loads faster
  Buffer:= BitmapFromString(300, 300, '');

  //Set white color in bull bitmap to be transparent
  SetTransparentColor(bull, clWhite);
  SetTransparentColor(bull2, clWhite);

  x:= 0;
  //let's demosntrate the speed of it, baby
  repeat
    //clear bitmap, make it green
    FastDrawClear(Buffer, clGreen);

    //draw 100 bulldozers on the buffer bitmap every tick
    for f:= 0 to 50 do
    begin
      FastDrawTransparent(Random(380) - 80, Random(380) - 80, bull, Buffer);
      FastDrawTransparent(Random(380) - 80, Random(380) - 80, bull2, Buffer);
    end;

    //draw a big bulldozer all over the small ones
    if(Direction = dirRight)then
      FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, bull, Buffer)
    else
      FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, bull2, Buffer);

    //move big bulldozer
    if(Direction = dirRight)then
      x:= x + 1;
    if(Direction = dirLeft)then
      x:= x - 1;
    //change direction if needed
    if(x <= 0)then
      Direction:= dirRight;
    if(x >= 100)then
      Direction:= dirLeft;

    //display the result
    SafeDrawBitmap(Buffer, GetDebugCanvas, 0, 0);

  until(False);
end.

You just took out the comments.

Read full topic

item.title: LOGO MADE BY ME! (highly edited of fastdrawtest)
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

here is is

program robbylogo;
type TDirection = (dirUp, dirDown);

var
  Buffer: Integer;
  Okey, Okey: Integer;
  f: Integer;
  Direction: TDirection;
  x: Integer;
begin
  DisplayDebugImgWindow(300, 300);

  Okey := BitmapFromString(80, 77, 'z78DAED9C31B683300C04AFC4' +
       '2972FF23FD22CD6F92E760ADBC5A660AAA40C02323D9065E2F000' +
       '00000A8E7FA07AD916A16CBF8850CBF58C62F709706FC027E01BF' +
       'FBF5C63AD4576EB177C9C0AFBAFDCFFA75B63CDDECCA395F2DE0B' +
       '7A7E5EFDDA3568E36D1F214BF3B2DBCE3EEDE794ECCBF3BAD579B' +
       'FDF1EB5055AE5C6FED5EF8751B3B4CF19B977FF18BDF5FEBCF7DB' +
       'FB5F9FADE993CC16F8F29F5F817BFBA71965B1650C44C86658739' +
       'A55FAF71E7373BBFF7BF4B578D179EB68E9357452BE20A7C2A6AC' +
       '873AD3A074CA4AC44BC8FB8BE8549F173770BA966F19B6D16BFD9' +
       '663FB9262A9CFDF64705C63BC73EDFFBE327D7E0DF8B7BF685B95' +
       '918B22D837A768B5170AAD9539641D71315F3D23875E8893D6B49' +
       'F8CDF0FBED59119C4EF6AB8B139C26F9CD789E44BBB6DEEBB7F69' +
       '990D46F2964FB3D5BC9F718ECAB54273F3FE9E3D7F3CB000EEF14' +
       'CCF53BE5CB0F97253DF9C5B3C5CE46A3430C57BD0DA7A8FFA7BCB' +
       '376D66F6D6C74561153EA7F9DDF8C1A40779F3F5B3974CE759CF5' +
       'AB6EED6CBF6E591BBF5539E85E0BABEB199F9A764AE655F420FC7' +
       '6FEEFF4FAF96C9BE3B72A57E277A7FEDF3782DF29EB5F3DB3103D' +
       '95337EA75C357E9F1933CF1CFFE2D7B3CE819E750100000000000' +
       '00000D0F107A457AEC9');

  Okey:= CreateMirroredBitmap(Okey);


  Buffer:= BitmapFromString(300, 300, '');

  SetTransparentColor(Okey, clWhite);
  SetTransparentColor(Okey, clWhite);

  x:= 0;
  repeat
    FastDrawClear(Buffer, clPurple);

    for f:= 0 to 50 do



    if(Direction = dirUp)then
      FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, Okey, Buffer)
    else
      FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, Okey, Buffer);

    if(Direction = dirUp)then
      x:= x + 1;
    if(Direction = dirDown)then
      x:= x - 1;
    if(x <= 0)then
      Direction:= dirUp;
    if(x >= 100)then
      Direction:= dirDown;

    //display the result
    SafeDrawBitmap(Buffer, GetDebugCanvas, 0, 0);

  until(False);
end.
